arts.ttl: Villa took advantage of unexpected Man City team selection - Murphy

arts.ttl: Guardiola hopes that Haaland will be fine after colliding with post in defeat to Aston Villa
arts.sum: Guardiola, while admitting he hadnâ€™t spoken to him, assumed that his star player, who failed to score and, as a result, ended the run of scoring in 12 consecutive games, will be fine as his side looks ahead to a midweek League Cup visit against Swansea City. Matty Cash was the only scorer in a game that provided showing for Villaâ€™s best performance of the season so far, and the defeat for Guardiola meant his team dropped into fifth in the Premier League table, having started the day in third.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa 1-0 Manchester City: Villa get richly deserved victory against tepid City
arts.sum: Well, if you had handed Emery a blank piece of paper and asked him to design a performance in a single game, it would be this one against Manchester City, as they beat the former perennial Premier League champions 1-0. But for all their control, they were undone by a clever Aston Villa set-piece, which saw Emiliano BuendÃ­a play the ball to Matty Cash, who was waiting like a coiled snake on the edge of the box, and as the ball reached him, he let off a beautiful effort into the far corner to put Villa one up.
